instruction.title: Instructions
instruction.1: Thank you for using our system.
instruction.2: We hope we can bring you good experience.
instruction.3: In this dashboard, you can view all elections, create new election, view your ethereum wallet address also current balance.
instruction.5: Click create new eleciton, type Election's name
instruction.7: Finish some election's information for anyone know more that.
instruction.8: Why any action take so long ?
instruction.9: Well, any action on AGU E-Voting will be write on blockchain, so we must be waitting for Consensus Mechanism
instruction.10: Usually, each action takes about one minute.
